record.name: Calling Card
record.description: Calling cards provide an easy method of placing telephone calls while away from the business office. The service is available from almost any phone, in most countries worldwide. All calls are charged directly to HP and billed at Company discounted rates.
record.detailedDescription: Calling cards provide an easy method of placing telephone calls while away from the business office. The service is available from almost any phone, in most countries worldwide. All calls are charged directly to HP and billed at Company discounted rates.
